methods: abstract boolean onInterceptTouchEvent(RecyclerView rv, MotionEvent e) Silently observe and/or take over touch events sent to the RecyclerView before they are handled by either the RecyclerView itself or its child views.

abstract void onTouchEvent(RecyclerView rv, MotionEvent e) Process a touch event as part of a gesture that was claimed by returning true from a previous call to onInterceptTouchEvent(RecyclerView, MotionEvent).
